duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement new and modify existing engineered labor standards in warehouse operations.
Support regional operations projects and recommend efficient and cost-effective solutions.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient and safe work methods.
Perform process simulations and assess impact on labor productivity.
Serve as a subject matter expert in work methods, labor standards, and efficiency techniques.
Monitor and analyze warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity metrics and identify new opportunities for efficiencies.
Maintain high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, required (Industrial Engineering degree preferred).
